name: Pelagos: A Marine Adventure
description:
Dive deep into the mesmerizing world of Pelagos! Crafted with Unity 3D, this marine photography game takes you on a tranquil journey through the enchanting California Kelp Forests. You'll be swimming through the debut level, surrounded by the unique flora and fauna of this vibrant biome.

As you explore, you'll have the chance to photograph a myriad of marine creatures. And here's the cool part: every time you snap a photo, you'll learn the name of the organism and save it in your very own in-game gallery. Whether it's a playful sea otter or the towering kelp canopies, every shot you take adds to your collection.

But "Pelagos" isn't just about capturing the beauty of the marine world. As you navigate the kelp forests, you'll stumble upon discarded trash—a stark reminder of the pollution threatening these pristine waters. Your mission? Photograph all the hidden trash. It's not just about cleaning up; there's a special surprise waiting for you once you capture it all!

And if you think you've seen it all, think again! Replay the levels to discover new angles, hidden species, and secret spots. And keep an eye out—the Great Barrier Reef level is coming soon! So, are you ready to dive in, learn, and make a difference? It's a "gotta photograph 'em all" kind of adventure in Pelagos!
